subject: Suits and Litigation
Ponzi Schemes
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Should Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz choose to fight the trustee in the Madoff case, they could well face a very hard road, according to interviews with lawyers and other legal experts.
snippet: Should Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz choose to fight the trustee in the Madoff case, they could well face a very hard road, according to interviews with lawyers and other legal experts.
